abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The oni's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). The oni can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: darkness, invisibility
1/day each: charm person, cone of cold, gaseous form, sleep

abilities.name: Magic Weapons.
abilities.description: The oni's weapon attacks are magical.

abilities.name: Regeneration.
abilities.description: The oni regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.
